blocks.headline: Ciao
blocks.subtext:
Ciao is a social network I built by funnelling all my gripes with traditional social media into a new experiment to make the internet, and social networking a little better. It's still under active development and will be launching in formal beta mode this summer!

I wanted to create something that everything I saw lacking in traditional social media and hopefully recapture some of the promise that I felt when I started using FaceBook and Twitter back in the mid 2000s.

##### Ciao is:

* Ad free
* Privacy focused
* Segmented by audiences: you get to share what you want with who you want
* For families and friends 

##### Built with:

* Ruby on Rails 
* PostgreSQL 
* Bootstrap 
* HOT Wire

aboutBody:
##### Name, Location, Occupation:

My name is Travis Fantina, I'm a fullstack developer from Earth. Currently living in
Ontario, Canada.

##### Vocation:

I'm under contact full-time with an agency called Objective in Salt Lake City, where I do client work big and small. Everything from single page marketing sites made with NextJS to massive B2B ecommerce platforms built with Elixir.

I am not accepting new client work but you should shoot me an email anyway, I'm always interested in evening projects, side hustles and in general biting off more than I can chew.

##### A Very Particular Set of Skills:

* Ruby & Rails
* Elixir & Phoenix
* NextJS
* CraftCMS
* Not Wordpress please

##### Website
